Testing PEEK
============

Test 1: PEEK returns values in range 0-255
Tested 20 PEEK calls
All values in range 0-255: PASS

Test 2: PEEK accepts various addresses
PEEK(0) in range 0-255: PASS
PEEK(100) in range 0-255: PASS
PEEK(65535) in range 0-255: PASS

Test 3: PEEK for random seeding pattern
Random seed in range 0-255: PASS

PEEK tests complete!
